Memphis in May

Fridays from 4:30 - 6:30PM Winter Season:November – February

Memphis in May hosts its annual celebrations in Tom Lee Park during the month of May. Lineup and tickets are available at memphisinmay.org.

Get Your Tickets

Wine on the River

Yearly in October

Each October, Wine on the River takes place along the riverwalk in Mud Island Park. Tickets are available at wineontherivermemphis.com.

Get Your Tickets

Duncan-Williams St. Jude Dragon Boat Races

Yearly in May

The Duncan-Williams St. Jude dragon boat races take place each May at Mud Island Park. It’s free to attend but boat crews must pay a registration fee. Details and registration is available at stjude.org.

Get Notified
